__e: Hey,how about talking to me instead of ignoring me?
So you should have told me and let me deal with it, rather than forcing me to.
Instead of love, I... got a constant series of affairs.
But sometimes I ask why God had to take my son and my husband instead of me, and then I feel like your daughter did... life is unlivable.
Instead of making me drive all the way. Out of my way to help you.
Do you think I don't know that you want her? Her instead of me!
If being here instead of home makes you happy, then-- then you should stay.
Why don't you just let it be instead of trying to put a label on it? Let it be.
Instead of going to her, you must find a way to let her know... ... shecancometoyou.
Why is it that... we want the ones that don't see us... instead of the ones that do?
Asking him to pick me over them is asking him to change the thing about him that I love the most.
Wondering why they chose to be evil, disgusting monsters instead of good guys like us!
Why would I want to be with them when I could be with you?
Shouldn't you be out looking for him instead of talking to me?
Then why are you here with me instead of with him?
But instead of hating being back I'm wondering why I ever left.
That you chose to save me instead of her.
No, a guide to help people understand why we should be protecting these creatures instead of killing them.
"Now it was a question of letting one be done, and not so much doing."
You know... we could've called into the office, but the boss sent me... because maybe we can make a deal and there won't be any problem.
No, a guide to help people understand why we should be protecting these creatures instead of killing them.
You should see him then, rather than talking to me
It's so important to talk, instead of avoiding each other.
How about instead of worrying about everyone else, you start focusing on trying to be the person Henry wants you to be before you lose him for good?
